Traits.Name: Shadow Stealth
Traits.Content: While in dim light or darkness, The Shadowking can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

Traits.Name: Dream Weaver
Traits.Content: The Shadowking can influence the dreams of creatures within 1 mile of its location, causing either nightmares or pleasant dreams as it chooses.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content: The Shadowking is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The Shadowking has the following spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): chill touch, minor illusion, mage hand. 1st level (4 slots): dissonant whispers, shield. 2nd level (3 slots): mirror image, darkness. 3rd level (3 slots): fear, vampiric touch. 4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, blight. 5th level (2 slots): dominate person, cloudkill. 6th level (1 slot): true seeing.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the Shadowking fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Shadowking makes two attacks with Shadow Blade and one attack with Nightmarish Grasp.

Actions.Name: Shadow Blade
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +12 to hit, dealing 12 (2d10 + 2) psychic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Nightmarish Grasp
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +12 to hit, dealing 19 (3d10 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Shadowy Onslaught
Actions.Content: The Shadowking unleashes a wave of darkness in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within range must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw or take 39 (7d10) necrotic damage, or half as much on a successful save.

LegendaryActions.Name: Veil of Shadows Legendary Action 1 (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Shadowking can fade into the ethereal plane until the start of its next turn. Until then, it imposes disadvantage on the next attack roll made against it.

LegendaryActions.Name: Macabre Manifestation Legendary Action 2 (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Shadowking can choose to use Shadowy Onslaught.

LegendaryActions.Name: Whispers of Dread Legendary Action 3 (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The Shadowking targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened and take 39 (7d10) psychic damage.
